title: ADA COMPLIANCE
description: This subproject will help bring education facilities into compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). Education facilities were constructed prior to the implementation of legislation that provides for equal access to public facilities for persons with disabilities. This subproject will work from an ADA transition plan that incorporates Special Education initiatives and programs. The scope of work includes preparation of an ADA transition plan, installation and/or redesign of ramps, toilet partitions, doors, hardware, elevators and water fountains and doorway entries specifically designed for persons with disabilities.
justification: It is necessary to comply with requirements of the Americans with Disabilities Act.
progress_assessment: The project is progressing as planned.
